name: Creepy Pasta
description:
Ever wonder how Creepy Pasta is made? Look no further! Spoopy Skeletons stir the pot while dodging the spookiest ghosts you ever did see. (Run in 1200x800)

This game was developed during a game jam at Columbia College Chicago during the fall of 2015. I was directly responsible for; UI functionality, and Ghost pathing AI, as well as concept development.
